Package com.bfo.netkeystore.server

Interface KeyAuthorization

All Known Implementing Classes:
SampleOnlineOTP
public interface KeyAuthorization
The KeyAuthorization manages the unlocking strategey for keys. There is one per Server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final KeyAuthorization
    EXPLICIT
    The default "Explicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password sent by the client to unlock the key
    static final KeyAuthorization
    IMPLICIT
    An "Implicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password set in the configuration file to unlock the key

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    configure(Json config)
    Configure the KeyAuthorization.
    PrivateKey
    getPrivateKey(Principal principal, Credential credential, String cid, Json json)
    Return the PrivateKey from the credential, or null if the key is not unlocked
    void
    initialize(HttpServer htserver, String prefix, Json info)
    Initialize the HttpServer on startup.
    boolean
    isOTP()
    Return true if this an an "OTP" key, false if it's a "PIN"
    void
    setKeyInfo(Principal principal, Credential credential, String cid, Json json)
    Populate the map in the credentials/info request with details for the supplied credential.
    void
    setServer(Server server)
    Set the Server this KeyAuthorization is working for.

  • Field Details

    • EXPLICIT

      static final KeyAuthorization EXPLICIT
      The default "Explicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password sent by the client to unlock the key

    • IMPLICIT

      static final KeyAuthorization IMPLICIT
      An "Implicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password set in the configuration file to unlock the key

  • Method Details

    • setServer

      void setServer(Server server)
      Set the Server this KeyAuthorization is working for. Will be called on initialization
      Parameters:
      server - the server

    • getPrivateKey

      PrivateKey getPrivateKey(Principal principal, Credential credential, String cid, Json json)
      Return the PrivateKey from the credential, or null if the key is not unlocked
      Parameters:
      principal - the principal
      credential - the credential
      cid - the credential id
      json - the contents of the credentials/authorize method
      Returns:
      the private key, or null if the key is not unlocked

    • configure

      void configure(Json config) throws Exception
      Configure the KeyAuthorization. The default implementation does nothing
      Parameters:
      config - the confguration
      Throws:
      Exception - if configuration failed

    • initialize

      void initialize(HttpServer htserver, String prefix, Json info)
      Initialize the HttpServer on startup.
      Parameters:
      htserver - the HttpServer to add methods or configure TLS authentication on
      prefix - the base prefix for any methods being added - typically this is something like "/csc/v1".
      info - a template for the info response, which can have values added to it - for example, adding "auth/login" to the "methods" list

    • setKeyInfo

      void setKeyInfo(Principal principal, Credential credential, String cid, Json json)
      Populate the map in the credentials/info request with details for the supplied credential.
      Parameters:
      principal - the principal
      credential - the credential
      cid - the credential id
      json - the key info map to populate

    • isOTP

      boolean isOTP()
      Return true if this an an "OTP" key, false if it's a "PIN"
      Returns:
      true for OTP, false for PIN
